text.section: Funds for the costs of the administration of the program shall be as provided by the Governor in the annual budget.

The grant recipient shall:
Submit periodic reports to the Secretary of Labor, Licensing, and Regulation summarizing its activities under the program;
Meet and consult with the Secretary about the program; and
Make available to the Secretary for inspection, the recipient's books, accounts, and other records associated with the program at such times as are mutually agreed upon by the parties.
